title: Schumer is poised to make history as New York’s longest-serving senator.
description: The Senate leader’s re-election would be quite an achievement considering the luminaries who have represented New York in the upper chamber.
dc:creator: Carl Hulse

media:content.media:credit: Laylah Amatullah Barrayn for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Senator Chuck Schumer casts his vote in Park Slope, Brooklyn, on Tuesday.
